trans-unit.source: Represents an exception handler in a byte array of IL to be passed to a method such as <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetMethodBody*>.
trans-unit.target: 表示要传递给<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetMethodBody*>.</xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetMethodBody*>之类的方法的 IL 字节数组中的异常处理程序

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.Emit.ExceptionHandler"></xref> class with the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Reflection.Emit.ExceptionHandler"></xref>使用指定的参数的类。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset of the first instruction protected by this exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 受此异常处理程序的第一个指令的字节偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes protected by this exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 受此异常处理程序的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset of the beginning of the filter code.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器代码的开头的字节偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The filter code ends at the first instruction of the handler block.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器代码在处理程序块的第一个指令处终止。

trans-unit.source: For non-filter exception handlers, specify 0 (zero) for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 对于非筛选器异常处理程序，指定此参数为 0 （零）。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset of the first instruction of this exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 此异常处理程序的第一个指令的字节偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in this exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 此异常处理程序中的字节数。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the kind of exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 指定的异常处理程序类型的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The token of the exception type handled by this exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 此异常处理程序处理的异常类型的标记。

trans-unit.source: If not applicable, specify 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 如果不适用，指定 0 （零）。

trans-unit.source: tryOffset, filterOffset, handlerOffset, tryLength, or handlerLength are negative.
trans-unit.target: tryOffset, filterOffset, handlerOffset, tryLength, or handlerLength are negative.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.Emit.ExceptionHandler"></xref> object is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否的此实例<xref href="System.Reflection.Emit.ExceptionHandler"></xref>对象是否等于指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare this instance to.
trans-unit.target: 要与此实例比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: if obj and this instance are equal; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 obj 与此实例相等; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.Emit.ExceptionHandler"></xref> object is equal to another <xref href="System.Reflection.Emit.ExceptionHandler"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否的此实例<xref href="System.Reflection.Emit.ExceptionHandler"></xref>对象是否等于另一个<xref href="System.Reflection.Emit.ExceptionHandler"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The exception handler object to compare this instance to.
trans-unit.target: 要与此实例比较的异常处理程序对象。

trans-unit.source: if other and this instance are equal; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 other 与此实例相等; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the token of the exception type handled by this handler.
trans-unit.target: 获取由此处理程序处理的异常类型的令牌。

trans-unit.source: The token of the exception type handled by this handler, or 0 if none exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在，由此处理程序或 0 处理的异常类型的标记。

trans-unit.source: Gets the byte offset at which the filter code for the exception handler begins.
trans-unit.target: 获取的字节偏移量，异常处理程序的筛选器代码从此处开始。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset at which the filter code begins, or 0 if no filter is present.
trans-unit.target: 开始，筛选器代码的字节偏移量或如果存在任何筛选器，不则为 0。

trans-unit.source: Serves as the default hash function.
trans-unit.target: 作为默认哈希函数。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length, in bytes, of the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 获取长度，以字节为单位，异常处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The length, in bytes, of the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 长度，以字节为单位，异常处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the byte offset of the first instruction of the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 获取异常处理程序的第一个指令的字节偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset of the first instruction of the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 异常处理程序的第一个指令的字节偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the kind of exception handler this object represents.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，表示此对象表示的异常处理程序的种类。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the kind of exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 指定的异常处理程序类型的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two specified instances of <xref href="System.Reflection.Emit.ExceptionHandler"></xref> are equal.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否两个指定的实例<xref href="System.Reflection.Emit.ExceptionHandler"></xref>是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个对象。

trans-unit.source: if left and right are equal; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if left and right are equal; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two specified instances of <xref href="System.Reflection.Emit.ExceptionHandler"></xref> are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否两个指定的实例<xref href="System.Reflection.Emit.ExceptionHandler"></xref>是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个对象。

trans-unit.source: if left and right are not equal; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if left and right are not equal; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Gets the length, in bytes, of the code protected by this exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 获取长度，以字节为单位，受此异常处理程序的代码。

trans-unit.source: The length, in bytes, of the code protected by this exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 受此异常处理程序的代码的长度，以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: Gets the byte offset at which the code that is protected by this exception handler begins.
trans-unit.target: 获取的字节偏移量，受此异常处理程序的代码从此处开始。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset at which the code that is protected by this exception handler begins.
trans-unit.target: 受此异常处理程序的代码开始的字节偏移量。
